title: Region bounded by trig and exp functions part - b

content.description: Let f and g be the functions given by f(x) = 1 + sin(2x) and g(x) = ex/2. Let R be the shaded region in the first quadrant enclosed by the graphs of f and g as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

topic.text: 8.11: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using Æ’'(x), y', and dy/dx).
